model

Class AbstractCharacter

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • model.AbstractCharacter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Enemy, PlayableCharacter

    public abstract class AbstractCharacter
extends java.lang.Thread
    Abstract class used for all Characters in the labyrinth.

        public AbstractCharacter(int x,

        Constructor of AbstractCharacter. Set the position of the AbstractCharacter with specific coordinates.
        Parameters:
        x - Abscissa in the labyrinth of the character.
        y - Ordinate in the labyrinth of the character.

    • Method Detail

      • getType

        public int getType()
        Retrieves the type of the Character. Retrieves the type of the character : -1 is for the Enemy 1 is for the PlayableCharacter.
        Returns:
        The type.

      • getPosition

        public Vertex getPosition()
        Retrieves the position of the character. Retrieves a Vertex corresponding to the position of the current character.
        Returns:
        A Vertex corresponding to the position.

      • setPosition

        public void setPosition(int x,
                        int y)
        Change the position of the character to specific location. Set the position of the current character to specific location, this method will test if the coordinates are in bounds. If not, this method does nothing.
        Parameters:
        x - The target location abscissa.
        y - The target location ordinate.
